p: In the combination assays, the checkerboard procedure described by White et al. [ 49] was followed to evaluate the synergistic action of the EO with selected drugs. Twelve double serial dilutions of the EO were prepared following the same method used to evaluate the MIC. Dilutions of the EO were prepared together with a series of double dilutions of the antimicrobial drugs: for antifungal drugs in the range of 32.0–0.66 μg/mL, for antibacterial in the range of 64.0–0.125 μg/mL and for M. piperita EO in the range of 18.2–0.09 mg/mL.
